definition: to load/to charge/to feed (esp. a machine)
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: The machine is featured by mechanic loading and automatic discharging.
sentences.chinese: 该机能够机械装料，自动卸料。

sentences.english: The operation of the first loading indicates that this system is reliable.
sentences.chinese: 通过初装料的运行，证明该系统运行良好。

sentences.english: The paper discusses the three efficient of loading stability in pressing automatic.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了自动压制时，影响装料稳定性的三大因素。

sentences.english: However, the distributing ring of furnace throat is the most simple auxiliary charging device for distribution control.
sentences.chinese: 炉喉布料挡圈是一种控制布料最简便的辅助装料设备。

sentences.english: Bell-type furnace was designed in advanced new technology.
sentences.chinese: 底装料立式多用炉设计新颖，技术先进。

sentences.english: Suggesting that 2/3 of the initial core loading cost of NPP should enter into the working capital.
sentences.chinese: 建议核电站首炉装料费用的三分之二列入周转资金。

sentences.english: It fuzes on impact with a shaped charge capable of destroying or disabling armored vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 其撞击引信引爆装料可以摧毁或报废敌装甲车辆。

definition: to construct by hoisting ready-built components into place
